name: Initia: Elemental Arena
description: Initia: Elemental Arena is a new take on online arena shooters. It blends frantic team-based game play of first person Arena shooters like Unreal Tournament & the FPS Magic mechanics of Skyrim. It combines it all with strategic objectives and tactical team play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 480 | AMD Radeon HD 5850  DirectX: Version 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: Stereo
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz | AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 | AMD Radeon HD 7950  DirectX: 9.0c DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 20 GB available space Sound Card: Spatial sound cards
